name: Introduction to Communication Studies
description: This course introduces students to the field of communication studies. It covers fundamentals of communication theory, research methods, and communication contexts.

name: Intercultural Communication
description: This course focuses on the communication processes and contexts of culturally diverse societies, with an emphasis on the analysis of communication problems between cultures.

name: Gender and Communication
description: This course focuses on the communication processes associated with gender and sex, with an emphasis on the intersection of gender, sex, and culture.
